text: All health insurer health benefit plans shall reimburse for newborn hearing screenings conducted under this subchapter.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For D.C. Law 13-276, see notes following ยง 7-851.

Miscellaneous Notes

Section 7(b) of D.C. Law 13-276 provides:

"(b) Section 4 shall apply to all health benefit plans issued or reissued beginning on the first day of the month 120 days following the effective date of this act."
